text.p: Pontypridd - Try: Paul John; Con: Neil Jenkins; Pens: Jenkins
In Leicester: Leicester (England) beat Scottish Borders 43-3
Leicester - Tries: Eric Miller, Rory Underwood, Steve
Hackney, Matt Poole, John Liley, Dorian West. Cons: Rob Liley
Llanelli - Tries: Neil Boobyer, Stephen Jones, Rupert Moon,
Frano Botica; Cons: Botica (4); Pen: Botica.
Pau - Tries: Nicholas Brusque, Sebastian Claverie. Con:
Harlequins - Tries: Peter Mensah, Daren O'Leary (2), Laurent
Cabannes (2), Jamie Williams (3). Cons: Will Carling (2).
Neath - Tries: Steve Williams (2), Ian Boobyer; Cons:
Toulouse - Tries: Thomas Castaignede, Emile N'tamack, David
Berty (2); Pens: Castaignede (2); Drop: Castaignede, Christophe
Cardiff - Tries: Gareth Jones. Penalties: Lee Jarvis (5)
Munster - Tries: Anthony Foley, Mick Galwey, Killian Keane,
Ben Cronin, Richard Wallace, penalty try, Dominic Crotty; Cons:
Wasps - Tries: Chris Sheasby, Will Green, Jon Ufton, Shane
